channel.title: Commands?
channel.description:
Can someone tell me how or lead me to the guide that tells me how to add commands to my server?
Thanks!

item.title: Commands?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

add item command:

if command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cmd name”);
{
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
}

send message command:

if command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cmd name”);
{
sendMessage(“message here”);
}

add skill xp command:

if command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cmd name”);
{
addSkillXP(Xp, LVL");
}

delete item command:

if command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cmd name”);
{
deleteItem(ID, getItemSlot(ID, AMOUNT");
}

Here is a few basic ones, I’m sure you can edit them.
Add them under customCommands in client.java

Read full topic
